display_long_description:
Unleash Your fists in the sport of the future and become the FISTAGON Champion!  
▪️ Punch blocks.
▪️ Create combos.
▪️ Score big.
▪️ Drop your opponent.
▪️ Advance on leaderboards.

⭐ Official selection for Top 80 indie games-category in Tokyo Game Show 2023 ⭐

👊 Hard hitting punching mechanics: Hit harder and hit accurately for best scores.

✨ Varied Arenas: Conquer diverse grid-arenas with unique challenges. 

 💥 Special Blocks Galore: Face variety of special blocks like magnetic, explosive, handedness swap and others!

💪 Unique Characters: Choose your National Fister from variety of unique athletes.

🎮 Easy to Learn, Tough to Master: FISTAGON is accessible for all, but only the best rise to the top.

🌐 Online Multiplayer Mayhem: Crush rivals in one-on-one showdowns. Your goal: drop opponents from their platforms with high-scoring combos. Challenge fisters worldwide! 

Compete, Conquer, and FISTAGON! 
Master the art of punching, dominate the tournaments, and etch your name in FISTAGON history!
